items.title: Is it safe to store financial information here?
items.text: Yes. All data is encrypted and stored on secure servers with regular backups.

items.title: Is there a free version?
items.text: Yes, a trial period is available. There are also plans with extended features.

items.title: Can I manage multiple projects at once?
items.text: Yes, you can create multiple companies (projects) and track finances for each — perfect for agencies and diversified businesses.

items.title: Do I need to install anything?
items.text: No. The service works entirely online — in a browser on any device.

items.title: What is a financial management service?
items.text: It's an online platform that helps you track income and expenses, plan budgets, send client invoices, control cash flow, and make informed decisions.

items.title: How do I remind a client about payment?
items.text: The service automatically sends reminders based on your set deadlines. You can also send a message manually.

items.title: Is the service suitable for working with legal entities?
items.text: Yes, you can issue invoices and manage financial relationships with both individuals and companies, including all required details.

items.title: How is your service different from regular Excel accounting?
items.text: Excel is manual and error-prone. Our service automates data collection, processing, and visualization, updates in real time, and provides ready-made reports.

items.title: Who can use the service?
items.text: Business owners, CFOs, startups, analysts, investors, as well as freelancers and sole proprietors looking to better understand their finances.
